thread.title: RNA Editing Technique Treats Severe Form of Muscular Dystrophy (Northwestern University)
thread.title_full: RNA Editing Technique Treats Severe Form of Muscular Dystrophy (Northwestern University) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: RNA Editing Technique Treats Severe Form of Muscular Dystrophy (Northwestern University)
text: ( Source : Northwestern University ) CHICAGO --- An RNA editing technique called 'exon skipping' has shown preliminary success in treating a rare and severe form of muscular dystrophy that currently has no treatment, based on a new study from
